Title: Venture Global signs two 20-year LNG term deals with New Fortress Energy
Description: US project developer Venture Global has signed two 20-year term supply agreements with gas-to-power developer New Fortress Energy, with one contract each for 1 mtpa from the 20 mtpa Plaquemines and 20 mtpa CP2 LNG projects that Venture Global is developing.
Author: CK

Title: Japan’s LNG stocks bounce following a drop to this winter’s lowest level in early March
Description: Japan’s LNG stocks held by the country’s power utility firms have recovered slightly following a drop to their lowest levels this winter, according to data released today by the Ministry of Energy, Trade and Industry (METI).
Author: CK

Title: Egypt’s EGAS offers three April LNG cargoes from Damietta
Description: Egypt’s state-owned EGAS has issued a tender to sell three cargoes that will load across April at the 5 mtpa Damietta LNG plant. The tender closes on Mar. 21.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks April LNG cargoes through a fourth tender
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued its fourth tender to buy April LNG cargoes for delivery to its 11.5 mtpa Map Ta Phut LNG receiving facility in the country’s southern Rayong province. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Sakhalin Energy offers second cargo loading in second-half April
Description: Sakhalin Energy has issued a tender to sell a cargo that will load at its 10.9 mtpa Sakhalin LNG terminal at Russia’s Progorodnoye port on Apr. 25. The tender closes on Mar. 18, with bids expected to remain valid until the following day.
Author: CK
